--- select_literals_array_invalid.sql
SELECT
  [[1, 2, 3], [2, 4, 6], [3, 6, 9]]

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.ArrayLiteral{
          Array:  0,
          Lbrack: 9,
          Rbrack: 41,
          Type:   nil,
          Values: []ast.Expr{
            &ast.ArrayLiteral{
              Array:  0,
              Lbrack: 10,
              Rbrack: 18,
              Type:   nil,
              Values: []ast.Expr{
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 11,
                  ValueEnd: 12,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "1",
                },
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 14,
                  ValueEnd: 15,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "2",
                },
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 17,
                  ValueEnd: 18,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "3",
                },
              },
            },
            &ast.ArrayLiteral{
              Array:  0,
              Lbrack: 21,
              Rbrack: 29,
              Type:   nil,
              Values: []ast.Expr{
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 22,
                  ValueEnd: 23,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "2",
                },
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 25,
                  ValueEnd: 26,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "4",
                },
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 28,
                  ValueEnd: 29,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "6",
                },
              },
            },
            &ast.ArrayLiteral{
              Array:  0,
              Lbrack: 32,
              Rbrack: 40,
              Type:   nil,
              Values: []ast.Expr{
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 33,
                  ValueEnd: 34,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "3",
                },
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 36,
                  ValueEnd: 37,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "6",
                },
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 39,
                  ValueEnd: 40,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "9",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT ARRAY[ARRAY[1, 2, 3], ARRAY[2, 4, 6], ARRAY[3, 6, 9]]
